user_greet: Hello, how can I help you today?
goodbye: Alright, goodbye! Have a good day ahead!
deny: Alright, goodbye! Have a good day ahead!
city_registration:
For city registration, you must: 1) Book an appointment at the rathaus; book at: https://www.deggendorf.de/rathaus 
2) Prepare the requisite documents (Rental agreement, passport, landlord details form).
recently_arrived: Welcome to Deggendorf! Upon arriving in Deggendorf, first register at the town hall. Following this, you can expect to receive your tax ID by mail within a few days. To obtain your student ID, a visit to the University will be necessary. Additionally, if you don't currently possess a bank account in Germany, it's crucial to open one.
health_insurance: I can help you with health insurance. Which provider are you interested in?
no_passport: I'm sorry, but you won't be able to continue without your passport. It's required for all official paperwork. If you have lost your passport, please contact your embassy.
no_city_registration: If you do not have a city registration certificate yet, please obtain one first. It is very important in Germany and is essential for anything and everything here.
no_translator: Please find someone that can translate for you. To minimize liabilities on their side, banks and other private entities will speak with you only in German, and you take the responsibility to translate what they say, so it is imperative that you have a German to English translator. You can try asking one of your classmates.
no_taxid: You will get your tax ID by post a few days after you get the city registration certificate. If you already attended the appointment for the city registration certificate, wait. If you haven't applied for a city registration certificate, please do so immediately.
student_id: You can obtain the student ID card at the international office located in building B on campus. To collect it, please remember to bring your passport when you visit us.
accommodation: Our university provides access to an accommodation website (https://stwno.de/de/wohnen/zimmerboerse). Additionally, if you are seeking shared housing, you can explore WG-gesucht, an independent online platform. Lastly, keep an eye out for housing advertisements on the campus pinboard situated near the canteen and café area. For any other queries you can directly write to: (https://www.th-deg.de/en/study-with-us/accommodation)
still_no_accommodation: Please be patient. Rest assured, with some time and effort, you'll certainly find suitable accommodation soon.
rental_agreement: Ask your landlord for it; they should already have given it to you. If not, ask them to make one and give it to you.
landlord_detail: Ask your landlord for it. If they do not know where to find it, give them this link: https://sympat.me/download/vermieterbescheinigung. Ask them to print it out, fill it, and sign it, and give it to you.
matriculation_certificate: You can find your matriculation certificate at your University's online Primuss portal. Download it from there.
user_help: Hello, how can I help you today?
action_bank_account_sparkasse:
A bank account at Sparkasse is a good choice for students, it's affordable, most basic services are free and the application process is straightforward. 
 Go to your closest Sparkasse branch and ask for an appointment, you will need: 
 1) Tax ID 
 2) Passport 
 3) German to English translator 
 (since all conversation will be carried out in German) 
 4) Matriculation certificate 
 5) City registration certificate 
 For more information, here is the link to the website: https://www.sparkassedeggendorf.de/de/home/privatkunden/girokonto.html?n=true&stref=opener#ueberblick
action_bank_account_deutschebank:
A bank account at Deutschebank is a good choice for students, it's affordable, most basic services are free and the application process is straightforward. 
 Go to your closest Deutschebank branch and ask for an appointment, you will need: 
 1) Tax ID 
 2) Passport 
 3) German to English translator 
 (since all conversation will be carried out in German) 
 4) Matriculation certificate 
 5) City registration certificate 
 For more information, here is the link to the website: https://www.deutsche-bank.de/pk/konto-und-karte/konten-im-ueberblick/konten-im-vergleich.html
action_bank_account_n26:
A bank account at N26 is a good choice for students, it's affordable, most basic services are free and the application process is straightforward. 
 Go to your closest N26 branch and ask for an appointment, you will need: 
 1) Tax ID 
 2) Passport 
 3) German to English translator 
 (since all conversation will be carried out in German) 
 4) Matriculation certificate 
 5) City registration certificate 
 For more information, here is the link to the website: https://n26.com/en-de/bank-account
action_bank_account_default: Sure, what bank would you like to open an account at ?
action_provide_health_insurance_tk: An Insurance policy with TK is a good choice for students, here is the link to the website: https://www.tk.de/service/form/2033438/mitgliedwerden/mitgliedwerden.form#sDV you can go here and follow the steps given there
action_provide_health_insurance_barmer: An Insurance policy with Barmer is a good choice for students, here is the link to the website: https://www.barmer.de/formClient/barmer-en/1053272/online-application,step=formStep1-Taetigkeit.html you can go here and follow the steps given there
action_provide_health_insurance_fintiba: An Insurance policy with Fintiba plus is a good choice for students, and you should already have it if you have taken out a blocked account at Fintiba, for more information, please contact your Fintiba agent
action_provide_health_insurance_default: Sure, where would you like to take out an insurance policy ?

campus_map: You can find the campus map at the following link: [Campus Map](https://www.th-deg.de/en/university/contact-access/campus-map).
american_embassy: The American Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Königinstraße 5, 80539 München. Here is a link for more information: https://de.usembassy.gov/embassy-consulates/munich/
british_embassy: The British Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Möhlstraße 5, 81675 München. Here is a link for more information: https://www.gov.uk/world/organisations/british-consulate-general-munich
canadian_embassy: The Canadian Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Leopoldstraße 23, 80802 München. Here is a link for more information: https://www.canadainternational.gc.ca/germany-allemagne/contact-contactez.aspx?lang=eng
australian_embassy: The Australian Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Sendlinger-Tor-Platz 1, 80336 München. Here is a link for more information: https://germany.embassy.gov.au/beln/Munich.html
indian_embassy: The Indian Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Widenmayerstraße 15, 80538 München. Here is a link for more information: https://www.cgimunich.gov.in/
chinese_embassy: The Chinese Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Richard-Strauss-Straße 48, 81677 München. Here is a link for more information: http://munich.china-consulate.gov.cn/eng/
japanese_embassy: The Japanese Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Karl-Scharnagl-Ring 7, 80539 München. Here is a link for more information: https://www.munich.de.emb-japan.go.jp/itprtop_en/index.html
french_embassy: The French Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Kaulbachstraße 13, 80539 München. Here is a link for more information: https://de.ambafrance.org/-Munchen-Consulat-general-
italian_embassy: The Italian Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Möhlstraße 3, 81675 München. Here is a link for more information: https://consmonacodibaviera.esteri.it/consolato_monacodibaviera/en/
german_embassy: You are in Germany, so there's no need for a German embassy. If you need any specific information, let me know!
brazilian_embassy: The Brazilian Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Sonnenstraße 31, 80331 München. Here is a link for more information: https://www.gov.br/mre/en/
russian_embassy: The Russian Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Maria-Theresia-Straße 17, 81675 München. Here is a link for more information: https://munich.mid.ru/web/munich-en
south_korean_embassy: The South Korean Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Zeppelinstr. 5, 81669 München. Here is a link for more information: http://overseas.mofa.go.kr/de-munich-en/index.do
mexican_embassy: The Mexican Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Oberföhringer Str. 45, 81925 München. Here is a link for more information: https://consulmex.sre.gob.mx/munich/
turkish_embassy: The Turkish Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Menzinger Str. 3, 80638 München. Here is a link for more information: http://munih.bk.mfa.gov.tr/Mission
saudi_embassy: The Saudi Consulate in Frankfurt is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Kennedyallee 123, 60596 Frankfurt am Main. Here is a link for more information: https://embassies.mofa.gov.sa/sites/germany/EN/Pages/default.aspx
spanish_embassy: The Spanish Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Oberföhringer Str. 45, 81925 München. Here is a link for more information: http://www.exteriores.gob.es/Consulados/MUNICH/en/Pages/inicio.aspx
south_african_embassy: The South African Consulate in Munich is the nearest one to Deggendorf. It is located at Sendlinger-Tor-Platz 1, 80336 München. Here is a link for more information: http://www.suedafrika.org/
thanks: You're welcome! Do you have any other questions ? If not, goodbye, and please have a nice day!
